text: Ezɨ me anetɨgha gɨvazɨma, atrivim uan gavman gumazir dapaniba bar me mɨgɨa ghaze, me izɨ uari akufagh. Eghtɨ gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumaziba ko, gumazir dapaniba ko, gumazir ekiar faragh zuiba ko, nguibamɨn gavmanɨn garir gumaziba ko, dagɨabar garir gumaziba ko, jasba ko, nguibabar gavmanɨn gumaziba me izɨ uari akufagh. Me izɨ, marvir guar Atrivim Nebukatnesar asarazir kam bagh, dughiar faragha zuimɨn an ziam fɨsɨ izam.
